title: ToG Season 1
description:
What do you desire? Money and wealth? Honor and pride? Authority and power? Revenge? Or something that transcends them all? Whatever you desireâ€”it's here.

--------------------

Hello fellow regulars!

This is an edited and retranslated version of season 1 of the original comic by SIU on Webtoon. I do not own any of this content. Webtoon, don't kill me - but damn, go back and edit your older works. Show some respect for one of your best selling and popular comics ;_;

This project aims to both elevate the source material's visual quality and preserve the original text's sentiment through proper localization. Things it does to do that:

- Correcting visual errors in panels that are fixed in newer editions
- Reclaiming some artwork via smaller SFX/speech bubbles where possible
- Standardizing fonts
- Correcting mistranslations/grammatical errors
- Reintroducing the original Korean jokes and some honorifics (and explaining them!)
- Standardizing terminology that gets constantly changed for no reason for a smoother, less confusing read throughout

Enjoy! ~ YeonFlame, solo lead of this project o7
author: SIU
